articles.title: Seven US Firms Drop H-1B Lawsuit Against US Federal Agency - NDTV
articles.description: A group of seven American businesses Monday announced to have dropped an H-1B lawsuit against the US Citizenship and Immigration Services after the federal agency agreed to accept and adjudicate previous decisions on foreign work visas.
articles.content:
H-1B is the most coveted foreign work visas for technology professionals from India.

articles.title: Ford Ranger Raptor X Reminds Us Of Truck's Forbidden Fruit Status - Motor1
articles.description: The Ford Ranger Raptor is forbidden fruit for an American truck buyer, but its X version in the Land Down Under is a salty reminder of that status.
articles.content: The Ford Ranger Raptor, no matter how much Americans want it, isn't happening on US shores. The little brother of the F-150 Raptor has become a staple offering of the Blue Oval in other parts of the … [+1541 chars]
